content.rendered:
Our Setup

An assembly line is a production process that breaks the manufacture of a good into steps that are completed in a pre-defined sequence

Our Process

Dazzle Retails is one of the most innovative display firms in the country. We conceptualize, design, engineer, manufacture and install point of sale (POS) display stands, showroom fixtures and racks all over India, and ship them to various countries across the world.

We understand the difficulty marketers face to get units designed manufactured and implemented. Our philosophy is to make brand-awareness an easy job for the marketer.

discover more

3D Design + Engineering

We conceptualize, design and engineer bespoke designs  that grab consumer awareness for your products .

PAN India Logistics

Dispatch and installations are done PAN India by our highly trained, technically skilled, and experienced team.

Prototyping​

We do prototyping to give you a chance to assess the viability of our designs along with how they integrate into your retail space. 

After Sales Service

We always follow up after installation to know what can be improved. 90% of raw material used in our products is reusable.

Manufacturing

Our unique in-house capacity gets you the best product at a cost-effective price, so you stay at a competitive edge. 

Quality Assurance

We set high standards of quality control throughout the manufacturing and delivery process with random inspections.

Dazzle Retails Unique In-House Capacity

Dazzle Retails has an in-house team for designing, R&D, painting, printing, welding, fabrication,  and electrical requirements. Our dynamic team of innovators delivers you POSM display stands that leave a lasting impression of your products.

Fabrication Machinery

  • AXYZ CNC Router
  • Laser Cutting Machine
  • Metal Cutting Machine
  • Acrylic Bending Machine

In-House Workshops

  • Carpentry unit
  • Welding unit
  • Paint booth
  • Electronics unit

Large-Format Printing

  • Agfa Jeti UV R2R printer
  • Agfa Jeti UV flatbed printer
  • Digital Latex printer
  • HP Inkjet digital printer
  • Agfa Jeti Solvent Printeri
  • Mutoh Eco-solvent printer
  • Flora Eco-solvent printer
  • Polaris Eco-solvent printer
  • DGI solvent printer
  • Mimaki vinyl cutting machine
  • UV lamination facility
